title: keep disconnecting and getting bans
body: for the last 2 days I have been trying to join a game and whenever i get to accepting the match it freezes then says i got disconnected from PvP.net and then i try to join another match queue and it says that i have a five minute , 10 minute , 15 minute ban etc for leaving champion select or declining too many matches what should I do, help.

replies.body:
Are you actually able to pass the AFK check and it just disconnects when heading to champion select, or does it disconnect before you are able to accept the match?

Either way, I'd recommend going through the [Connection Troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) as a starting point.  For some reason you're disconnecting, and this should help rule out the common causes.
